cvText:
Amanda Pathirana 
“Computer Science undergraduate at Eastern University's Trincomalee Campus, passionate about building efficient software solutions and 
managing data effectively. Skilled in programming and problem solving and ready to contribute to projects in database management and software 
development within the IT industry” 
 sanduamanda12@gmail.com   0703825083   protofolio-amanda-pathirana.netlify.app 
 https://www.linkedin.com/in/amanda-pathirana/    https://github.com/Sanduamanda99 
EDUCATION 
Eastern University of Sri Lanka | Trincomalee Campus 
• Bachelor of Computer Science (Undergraduate)                      Dec 2021 - Present 
Royal Central College | Polonnaruwa 
• G.C.E. Advanced Level Examination (1C pass & 2S passes for Physics, Chemistry & C.Maths)          2019 
• G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examination (8A passes & 1C pass)              2014 
Certificate Courses 
• Certificate of certified SQA Tester | Issued by FSD Academy                     Sep 2024 
• Introduction to Python | Issued by Sololearn                       Mar 2024 
• Introduction to Cyber Security | Issued by Cisco                     Dec 2023 
• PHP | Issued by Sololearn                        Apr 2023 
• Athena Hack-Hackathon for women | Powered by Ideamart                   Mar 2023 
• Introduction to HTML | Issued by Sololearn                     May 2022 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
Languages & Frameworks 
• Frontend - React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Material-UI, Bootstrap 
• Backend - Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, Firebase, PHP 
• Other Languages – C++, Python, Java 
• Frameworks – Spring Boot, Flask 
Developer Tools 
• Version Control - Git, GitHub 
• IDEs & Editors - VS Code, Dev C++, Jupyter Notebook 
• Design & Prototyping – Figma, Adobe XD, Adobe Flash 
• Containerization & Deployment - Render, Netlify 
• Project Management - Trello, Agile Development 
• API Testing - Postman, Insomnia 
• Testing & Automation - Selenium, Jest, JUnit 
  
Other Skills 
• SEO (Search Engine Optimization) 
• OOP (Object Oriented Programming) 
• Data Structures & Algorithms 
• Design Patterns 
• Agile Practices 
 
ACADEMIC PROJECTS & EXPERIENCES 
 
AI-Powered Solutions for Streamlined IT Recruitment and Skill Matching | Ongoing Project 
• Developed an AI-powered recruitment system to enhance hiring efficiency by algorithmically matching candidates with job 
opportunities. 
• Designed and implemented Skill-Based Assessments, and Video Analysis tools using NLP and AI to optimize recruitment. 
• Built with a scalable REST API utilizing Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and React.js, with CI/CD integration via Docker 
and Kubernetes. 
Predicting the undergraduate students’ failure rate in Trincomalee Campus | Academic Projects 
• Developed a predictive machine learning model and web application to forecast the failure rate of undergraduate students.  
• By using this website students can predict their failure rate semester-wise. 

Personal Portfolio Website | Personal Projects 
• Developed a modern portfolio website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and EmailJS, designed to showcase my skills and 
projects with a polished and user-friendly interface. 
Flappy Bird game | Academic Projects 
• The game features simple yet engaging gameplay where the player controls a bird that must navigate through a series of 
pipes without crashing. Java: The entire game is coded in Java, utilizing OOP principles.  
• Swing/AWT: The graphical user interface is implemented using Java's Swing/AWT libraries. Event Handling: The game 
uses Java's event-handling mechanisms to manage user input and control the game's flow. 
Currency Converter | Academic Projects 
• Designed to provide real-time currency conversion with a user-friendly interface.  
• Tech Stack: React.js for dynamic UI and state management. Tailwind CSS for sleek, responsive styling. Vite for fast 
development and build processes. 
Cash Money | Academic Projects 
• A Modern GUI for ATM Machines Cash Money, a user-friendly, cross-platform graphical application developed using 
Python 3.7 + and Tkinter.  
• This modern interface is designed to enhance the usability and functionality of ATM machines, offering an intuitive and 
seamless user experience. 
University Timetable Management System | Academic Projects 
• Developed course management, timetable creation, room/resource booking, and student enrollment features with conflict 
resolution to optimize scheduling efficiency. 
• Built a scalable REST API using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) with Vite and Flowbite, 
ensuring seamless integration and robust security through encryption and access controls. 
• Implemented unit testing with Jest to validate backend functionality and enhance system reliability. 
Virtual Dressing Room | Academic Projects | Group 
• Designed and developed a customizable garment e-commerce platform with a 3D visualization module, leveraging 
Express.js, MongoDB, and REST API for backend operations. 
• Built interactive garment customization features, enabling users to modify colors, upload images, and adjust design 
placement and scale, utilizing React.js, MUI, and Three.js for a dynamic frontend experience. 
Arcana Candles | Personal Projects  
• Designed and developed a secure e-commerce platform leveraging Firebase for authentication (Google Auth) and image 
storage, with MongoDB for scalable data management. 
• Engineered product and comment management features using Node.js, Vite, and Redux to optimize content updates and 
enhance user engagement. 
• Implemented dynamic promotional displays and customer review sections using React.js and Tailwind CSS to improve user 
experience and facilitate informed purchasing decisions. 
 
SOFT SKILLS 
 
REFERENCES 
 
Mrs. K. Khethika, Lecturer,  
Department of Computer Science,                                                                                                       
Faculty of Applied Science                                                                                                                    
Trincomalee Campus                                                                                                                                         
Eastern University of Sri Lanka 
khedikas@esn.ac.lk 
 
Mrs. J. Janani, Lecturer,  
Department of Computer Science,                                                                                                                   
Faculty of Applied Science                                                                                                                     
Trincomalee Campus                                                                                                                                                    
Eastern University of Sri Lanka 
jananij@esn.ac.lk

professionalExperiences.title: Internship
professionalExperiences.description:
Worked on a company registration platform to streamline the online business incorporation process.
Utilized Google Drive API for file uploads and backups and developed a fully responsive design using the MERN stack and MUI.
Managed user states with Redux and implemented secure login with OTP email validation. Integrated PayHere payment gateway with coupon functionality and added a PDF viewer for document management.
Technology stack: MERN Stack, Google Drive API, PayHere, MUI

Contributed to the development of a vehicle rental platform, providing users with access to reliable vehicles.
Created a fully responsive design and securely managed both user and owner-side pages.
Developed the website to showcase application details and built a rental management dashboard using MUI with React.js, ensuring optimization for SEO.
Technology stack: MERN Stack, MUI, REST APIs, SEO

Developed the company website, ensuring seamless functionality and user experience.
Integrated 3D model handling using Three.js and managed emails with Nodemailer.
Built a fully responsive design with Tailwind CSS, optimized for SEO, and developed the site using Next.js.
Technology stack: Next.js, Three.js, Tailwind CSS, SEO

Technical Skills  
Languages & Frameworks 
• Frontend - React.js, Next.js, React Native, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Material-UI, Bootstrap 
• Backend - Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, Firebase, Microservices 
• Other Languages - Java, Kotlin (Basic) 
Developer Tools 
• Version Control - Git, GitHub 
• IDEs & Editors - VS Code, Eclipse 
• Design & Prototyping - Figma 
• API Testing - Postman, Insomnia 
• Testing & Automation - Selenium, Jest 
• Containerization & Deployment - Docker, Render, Netlify 
• Project Management - Trello, YouTrack, Agile Development 
Other Skills 
• SEO (Search Engine Optimization) 
• OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) 
• Data Structures & Algorithms 
• Design Patterns 
• Agile Practices 

OTHER PROJECTS 
 
Farming Management System | Personal Project | Ongoing Project 
• Developed a system to manage farm operations, including tracking animal food purchases, stock levels, and daily production, using 
Node.js for the backend, REST APIs, and MongoDB. 
• Implemented bill management across multiple shops, tracking damaged quantities and ensuring accurate inventory records, utilizing 
Firebase for Google Auth. 
• Designed features for employe salary management to streamline payroll and financial tracking, employing React.js and Tailwind CSS 
for the frontend. 
 
Smart Waste Management System | Academic Project | Group | Ongoing Project 
• Developing a system to manage waste tracking, payments, and recycling incentives for households and businesses. 
• Backend built using Node.js, with a responsive frontend developed in Next.js and Tailwind CSS. 
• Building a mobile application using React Native to provide users with flexible access to waste management services. 
 
Arcana Candles | Personal Projects 
• Developed a secure e-commerce platform utilizing Firebase for Google Auth and Firebase DB for image storage, along with 
MongoDB for data management. 
• Implemented product and comment management features to streamline product updates and enhance user engagement, using 
Node.js, Vite, and Redux. 
• Integrated promotional displays and customer reviews on the homepage to improve user experience and aid decision-making, 
employing Tailwind CSS and React.js for the front end. 
 
Personal Portfolio Website | Personal Projects 
• Built a personal portfolio website using React.js and Material-UI to showcase information about myself, including education history 
and certifications. 
• Implemented a "Contact Me" feature with the Web3Forms API to enhance user engagement. 
Virtual Dressing Room | Academic Projects | Group 
• Developed a platform that allows users to explore and purchase customizable garments featuring a 3D visualization module, using 
Express.js, MongoDB, and REST API for backend functionality. 
• Implemented garment customization features, enabling users to change colors, upload images, and adjust the position and scale of 
designs, utilizing React.js, MUI, and Three.js for the frontend. 
 
Educational Platform for Online Learning | Academic Projects | Group 
• Developed a microservices-based platform using Docker for seamless integration and orchestration. 
• Built a responsive web client with the MERN stack, enabling course enrollment, progress tracking, and course management, utilizing 
React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. 
• Integrated payment gateways, including Stripe, for a streamlined course enrollment process, enhancing the user experience with 
Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Firebase. 
 
NASA API Portal | Academic Projects 
• Developed a web portal to provide easy access to NASA data, including imagery from Mars rovers and astronomy, utilizing the NASA 
API and Firebase Authentication. 
• Designed the portal with a fully responsive layout, enhancing accessibility using Tailwind CSS and React.js. 
University Timetable Management System | Academic Project 
• Designed features for course management, timetable creation, room/resource booking, and student enrollment with conflict 
resolution. 
• Built with a REST API for scalability and integration, utilizing Node.js, MongoDB, React.js, Express.js (MERN stack), Vite, and Flowbite 
for modern web technologies, with security ensured through encryption and access controls. 
• Conducted unit testing using Jest to validate backend functionality. 
 
In addition to this project, you can explore more of my simpler projects, available on my portfolio page and GitHub account.

• Problem Solving 
• Organizational Skills 
• Leadership 
References

• Time Management 
• References available upon request.
